terminologie_extrait.definition: where the opponent will hit the ball
terminologie_extrait.contexte: in the swing, when the opponent has committed to a specific placement

when_to_react.probleme: Reacting too late or not at all

debutant.step: Anticipate the opponent's return when they have committed to a specific placement

intermediaire.step: Learn to observe the opponent's direction and move before they hit the ball

exercices_complementaires.description: Watch for shoulder alignment early in the forehand swing; anticipate the direction

metriques_progression.target: React earlier and more accurately to the opponent's shots

erreurs_a_eviter.pitfall: Overreacting or moving too late; losing control of the game
